Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerMarried: Delphine: Glad the amulet worked out for you, honey, {0}.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerHasItem: Delphine: Don't be shy, now. Show that amulet to the one you intend to marry.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNotUpgradedHouse: Delphine: I can see that sparkle in your eye, {0}. You must be head over heels in love. But I'm afraid a bigger house is essential for a happy marriage.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerBuyItem_Question: Delphine: Ah, I can see it in your eyes... There's a special someone in your heart. Just so happens I'm selling one of my precious 'Mermaid's Pendants'. Give that to your intended and they'll know exactly what you mean.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNoRelationship: Delphine: I've got an important amulet to sell... but something tells me you're not ready for it, {0}.
